title: Up in smoke
creator_credit: British Columbia Forest Service and Barbara Davies
brief_description: Forest fire fighting in mountainous British Columbia has been developed to the precision of a military operation. Shows the whole pattern of attack, from the time smoke is sighted until the outbreak is brought under control. Includes aerial and ground attack.
creator_credit_for_label: British Columbia Forest Service and Barbara Davies
